TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Padding extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示與使用者介面 (UI) 項目有關聯的邊框距離或邊界資訊。

span.span: Represents padding or margin information associated with a user interface (UI) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構表示的矩形的 UI 項目，例如控制項相關聯的邊界或填補。The structure represents the padding or margin associated with a rectangular UI element such as a control. 填補為 UI 項目主體與其邊緣之間的內部空間。The padding is the internal space between the body of the UI element and its edge. 相反地，邊界是分隔的相鄰兩個相鄰的 UI 項目邊緣的距離。In contrast, a margin is the distance separating the adjoining edges of two adjacent UI elements. 由於結構化的相似處，用來代表邊框距離和邊界。Because of structural similarities, is used to represent both padding and margins. 說明圖表和屬性控制，請參閱[邊界和邊框距離在 Windows Form 控制項中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。For a diagram that illustrates the and properties on a control, see [Margin and Padding in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md). 填補會有不同的控制項，不是容器的控制項上的效果。Padding has a different effect on controls that are containers than on controls that are not. 例如，在控制項，屬性定義的框線之間的間距及其子控制項。For example, in a control, the property defines the spacing between the border of the and its child controls. 如控制項，屬性定義的框線之間的間距控制項和其所包含的文字。For a control, the property defines the spacing between the border of the control and its contained text. 除了一般的方法和屬性，也會定義下列型別層級成員：In addition to typical methods and properties, also defines the following type-level members: - 表示預先定義的欄位沒有填補。The field, which represents a predefined with no padding. - 一組來執行常用的算術運算，對於類別，例如新增兩個運算子物件相加。A set of operators for performing common arithmetic operations for the class, such as adding two objects together. 不支援運算子多載的語言，您都可以使用替代方法語法來叫用這些成員。For languages that do not support operator overloading, you can invoke these members by using alternative method syntax. - ， ，和屬性，提供合併會很方便用於自訂配置計算的值。The , , and properties, which provide combined values that are convenient for use in custom layout calculations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立外的框使用 Padding 屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the Padding property to create an outline around a control. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 建立框線周圍 Windows Form 控制項使用邊框間距](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Create a Border Around a Windows Forms Control Using Padding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Padding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Padding/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Padding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Padding/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the padding value for all the edges.

span.span: The padding, in pixels, for all edges if the same; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在擷取這個屬性，如果所有邊緣都使用相同的填補值時，則會傳回這個常用的值。When retrieving this property, if all the edges use the same padding value, then this common value is returned. 否則，則傳回-1，表示所有的填補值不相等。Otherwise, -1 is returned to indicate that all the padding values are not equal. 設定此值變更， ， ，和屬性。Setting this value changes the , , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白填補物件定義為具有， ，和邊框間距屬性設定為 0。An empty padding object is defined as having the , , and padding properties set to 0. 此不可變的欄位，適用於比較作業和初始化。This immutable field is useful for comparison operations and initializations.

summary.span: 產生目前 的雜湊程式碼。

span.span: Generates a hash code for the current .

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用， ， ，和值來產生代表目前的 32 位元雜湊碼。The method uses the , , , and values to generate a 32-bit hash code that represents the current . 雜湊程式碼會對應到物件的值 （因此具有相同的值的兩個物件應該產生相同雜湊程式碼） 的數字。A hash code is a number that corresponds to the value of an object (so two objects that have the same value should generate the same hash code). 雜湊程式碼用來排序與儲存物件的集合。Hash codes are used to sort and store collections of objects. 例如，代表金鑰-值配對，所整理的索引鍵的雜湊程式碼為基礎的集合。For example, a represents a collection of key-and-value pairs that are organized based on the hash code of the key. 如需有關雜湊程式碼和雜湊函式的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information on hash codes and hash functions, see the method.
